issue.title: [Enhancement] Add optional logging for storage operations

implementation.approach: TDD with minimal changes to storage.py
implementation.summary: Added optional debug logging for storage operations (load/save) via FLYWHEEL_DEBUG environment variable or constructor parameter. Logs include file path, operation type, record count, and elapsed time in milliseconds.

tests.coverage: Tests verify logging is enabled/disabled correctly, includes required fields (path, operation, count, timing), and can be controlled via env var or constructor param

commands_run: uv run ruff check tests/test_issue_4681_storage_logging.py src/flywheel/storage.py

risks: Logger configuration must be done by the application (user must set up logging handlers to see output)
Minimal performance impact when debug is disabled (just a boolean check)
